resources.string:
Looks interesting?

You can attempt match to know if you would go togethor.

 For free users, there is only one chance in a day for three days.

 Go premium to unleash!
Tap on an option and swipe the card for next question!

Match Success!

Congrats we believe you will be make it work!

 We will notify the other person and you can then connect if she agrees!
Or rewind to choose different answers or check unanswered questions by tapping on left arrow below!
